channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google Says Critical Android “No User Interaction” Attacks Underway
item.description: No user interaction Android hack attacks underway — take action now.

item.title: Windows Memory Exhaustion Network Crash Warning — No Microsoft Fix
item.description: Enterprise networks can be crashed remotely, and Microsoft has no fix.

item.title: Microsoft’s New Deadline—You Have 12 Weeks To Change Your Browser
item.description: You been warned — act before it's too late.
